contents.defaultValue:
1. Common damage forms:

    • (STR/2) + 2

    • (STR/2) + 12 + 2d6

    • STR + 6

  2. Notes:

    • Use parentheses for halves (example: (STR/2)).

    • Division uses floor rounding.

    • You may add dice as Nd6 (example: 2d6).

Bows do not use Strength rating for range.

All bows have a direct-fire short range of 70 m (35"), which gives +2 bonus dice to the shot.

Any shot between 70 m (35") and 300 m (150") must be shot at an arc and have −2 penalty dice on the shot.

Bow shots beyond 300 m are not possible.

Compound bows have a variable Strength minimum required to use them.

contents.tooltip: Single Shot. Characters can fire one bullet as a simple action. The player totals their Firearms skill plus accuracy and can use that many dice from their Finesse pool to fire the weapon.
contents.label: SS
